Not reproduced it on my end.
Try to clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

issue.title: listvpn.net detects using AdGuard
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension, AdGuard DNS, AdGuard for Mac

### AdGuard version

2.12.0.1385 release

### What type of problem have you encountered?

AdGuard gets detected on a website

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

listvpn.net

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots


https://uploads.adguard.org/up34_d5guk.png

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
Issue caused by List-KR (Season banner not shown).

For user filter until fixed in third-party filter list:
`/^https:\/\/sports-phinf\.pstatic\.net\/[0-9]{8}_[0-9]{2,}\/[A-z0-9]+_PNG\/[A-Z0-9%\._]+/$domain=naver.com,badfilter`

@piquark6046
please modify regexp rule or add exception rule, thank you.

comment.body:
Also not reproduced it on my end.
Try to leave only AdGuard filters from the config above, then clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

issue.title: mail.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [http://mail.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fmail.com) ### Comment > Problem :- ag base filter prevents the Brave shields to block of the blank frame on the right side of the inbox. But when i disable ad base filter then Brave Shields working without any issue. But i do not want to disable ag base filter for this one issue. > > Step to reproduce the issue :- Go to brave shields > set it to Aggressive > then go to custom filter > import ag base filter from this link https://filters.adtidy.org/extension/ublock/filters/2_without_easylist.txt then open the inbox of mail.com. you will see the blank frame. But if you disable the ag base filter then shields will block the blank frame successfully. > > Possible solution :- add this filter ' mail.*##html.can-have-sky .page-body > .section-content:style(margin-right: 0 !important;) ' to ag base filter list. ### Screenshots

comment.body:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/163068#issuecomment-1763207701 not reproduced it on my end - those ads are blocked. Try to uninstall 1Blocker, clear browser data, enable AdGuard Annoyances, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

comment.body: Добрый день. При входе на данный сайт должен появляться попап с верификацей возраста. При проверке - полностью у меня этот элемент полностью загружается. comment.body:
Big thanks to Adguard team for addressing this widespread issue. I appreciate your efforts more than I can say.

Not everyone uses youtube for entertainment, so it would be a considerable loss to not be able to go there anymore. And I would not go there if I had to pay the powers that be or suffer ads.

Some things are meant to be free, like sharing knowledge.

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Social Widget) [https://www.youtube.com/@tunetankmusic/about](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2F%40tunetankmusic%2Fabout) ### Comment > I used AdGuard on Chromium, Brave, and Firefox. While AdGuard is active I can not unsubscribe from any video on YouTube on any browser. Disabling and trying the page again fails. If I disable AdGuard, close the browsers, then restart, the unsubscribe button is visible again. I did update filters. ### Screenshots

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Social Widget) [https://www.youtube.com/@tunetankmusic/about](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2F%40tunetankmusic%2Fabout) ### Comment > I used AdGuard on Chromium, Brave, and Firefox. While AdGuard is active I can not unsubscribe from any video on YouTube on any browser. Disabling and trying the page again fails. If I disable AdGuard, close the browsers, then restart, the unsubscribe button is visible again. I did update filters. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/cq7zhgkoi08o4skkkgwcg8ggock0socbliaty4vxnk.jpg?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser extension v4.2.168 Browser: | Chrome Stealth mode options: | Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header,
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Self-destructing third-party cookies (2880),
Hide your Referrer from third-parties Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Social Widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

Security:
Online Malicious URL Blocklist,
NoCoin Filter List Other extensions used: | cookie auto delete
